abiDocs.name: remove
abiDocs.details: Creator of module can delete her existing registered module

inputs.description: address for which specific information is requested

inputs.name: rating
inputs.description: uint between 0 and 10; 0 being worst, 10 being best

abiDocs.name: vote
abiDocs.details: Only KYC registered users can vote on registered modules w rating betw 0 and 10
abiDocs.notice: Votes on an existing registered module
